tool_description: Unlock boundless connectivity with D7API Gateway, seamlessly connecting you to the world's vast messaging network through D7's exclusive network access
name: D7SMS
title: D7SMS

api_list.name: Get Viber Message Status
api_list.description: Retrieve the delivery status of Viber messages that were sent earlier.

api_list.name: Get Slack Message Status
api_list.description: Get Message Delivery Status of previously sent messages.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: The Request id which was returned from **Send Message** endpoint

api_list.name: Get OTP Status
api_list.description: Get the status of OTP generated or verified

required_parameters.name: otp_id
required_parameters.description: The otp_ id which was returned from **Send OTP** endpoint

api_list.name: Get Message Status
api_list.description: Get Message Delivery Status of previously sent messages.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: The Request id which was returned from **Send Message** endpoint

api_list.name: D7API - Check Balance
api_list.description: Get information about current balance on your D7API account
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://d7sms.p.rapidapi.com/messages/v1/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://d7sms.p.rapidapi.com/messages/v1/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
